summary:
Ambitious Supply Chain professional with experience in Philips, Mars Inc. and Procter & Gamble. Through my past experience, I have been developing knowledge in areas of supply planning, Business & Strategic Planning,  Procurement and project management as well as strong communication and leadership skills.

Key areas of expertise is Sales and operations planning, Forecasting, SAP, Project Mangement, Demand planning and Business planning.

profile_positions.description:
•	Represent magnetic resonance team in planning in lifecycle related BU projects (New Product Introduction, Engineering changes, Last Time Buy, Phase-outs) to ensure impact on service parts are considered and to execute on plan.
•	Managing the End to End Planning Process for Magnetic Resonance Modality starting from demand forecasting, stock target setting and supply planning across the network of 4 central and 120 market locations.
•	Utilizing the advanced planning tool  to periodically validate and update the parts planning, follow-up on planning alerts, and master data management.
•	Leading Inventory clean up actions for magnetic resonance service parts in the 4 regional distribution centers. 
•	Partnering with colleagues within Service parts planning (Strategic planning, Business Unit, Markets, Supply management, Master data, ASAP desk)  to secure parts availability for the customer.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Planner

profile_positions.description:
•	Create the APO bottom- up forecast at SKU level  in the 3 - 24 month period using weekly buckets. 
•	Monthly brand forecast review including risks & opportunities across the top 150 airports in the world.
•	Lead the monthly demand meeting with finance, sales, marketing and commercial teams through the demand management review within S&OP+.
•	Kick off gap closing meetings and driving actions through them or moving them to the other S&OP+ steps.
•	Create, animate and drive improvements in forecast KPIs (BIAS and Sales forecast accuracy).
•	Create and own all reporting tools used as part of the demand planning process: demand review, pre-consensus files (promo), daily sales report, forecast accuracy and bias, etc.
•	Work closely with the activity manager to ensure all demand planning inputs are provided on time. Taking pivotal role in the execution through the connection with the different factories around the globe.
•	Provide planning guidance to the business and activity manager by advising on anything related to switch dates, run out dates, forecast changes, etc.
•	Support the demand planning manager in Pre-SOP monthly process with factories and others CBU's to share forecast evolution and supply situation.
•	Work closely with supply on ensuring correct dependent demand is shown to the factories.
•	Leadership of demand management process across DWUK and with factories, covering all aspects of planning for NPD, packaging changes, promotion, exit strategy, etc.
•	Represent Planning/Supply Chain in key market-factory meetings.
profile_positions.title: Senior Demand Planner- International Travel Retail

profile_positions.description:
-Plan and coordinate product distribution activities for multiple markets between Africa, Europe, Asia and Australia.
- Manage the supply outcome based on the S&OP requirements on monthly basis.
- SAP experience in production and distribution requirement planning transactions and order management. 
-Maintain distribution records and monitor pending shipments.
-Work with Materials department to determine shortages and excess of supplies and defining solutions in both situations.  
- Acting as supply SPOC for monthly reviews of supply chain KPIs (Case fill, On time delivery, Inventory and cash closings for finished goods and raw materials, Factory shutdown plans, etc.)
-Ensure smooth execution of activities and initiatives across Egypt, Levant, Gulf, Saudi, India, Netherlands and Australia.
-Analyze and resolve delivery issues in a timely fashion.
-Review and recommend improvements to current product distribution parameters. 
-Develop continuous improvement initiatives to increase efficiency, productivity and customer services, e.g, supporting the transition from land freight to sea freight for cost optimization purpose.
profile_positions.title: Distribution requirment planner

profile_positions.description:
-Creating production plans to ensure market needs are met for Egypt, Saudi, UAE, Morocco, Algeria, Jordan, Iraq, Qatar, Bahrain, Australia &India. 
-Planning extended overhauling activities on the lines and minimizing their impact on the markets to eliminate any potential out of stock due to the long shutdown.  
-Managing stuffing availability for line operations to avoid any overtime incurred and avail the necessary time for developing the stuff through training programs. 
-Accomplishing target inventory closings while ensuring the right case fill level 98.5%. 
-Perform capacity planning for long-term (18 months) and short-term, managing constraints that might arise and the solutions when it comes to pre-build or changing the working pattern for operations in the factory.
-Ensuring the right requirements are reflected for the raw and pack material team on SAP to make sure that the team has the correct visibility while they manage the orders and the pipelines.
profile_positions.title: Production Planner

profile_positions.description:
-	Leading new market entry projects to drive sales and profit growth and react to market competition. 
-	Leading SNO delivery teams for end to end supply chain project execution for new market entries, formula update and artworks changes for Rolling 3 months. 
-	Leading Category Budget for initiatives and non initiatives projects.
-	Provide what If scenarios from supply stand point to enable fast reaction to competition. 
-	Managing Critical path schedule for initiative and non-initiative related activities and provide Initiative risk and readiness check list. 
-	Communicating Marketing and commercial plans to SNO Delivery team and enable the perfect execution of the promotional activities on timely basis with the needed volumes.
profile_positions.title: Initiative Operations Leader

profile_positions.description:
-	Managing production plans to ensure market needs are met for Egypt, Lebanon, Yemen, Angola, Tanzania, Uganda, Ethiopia, Kenya, Madagascar and Moraceous from the 5 brands (Ariel, Tide, Bonux, Lang and Yes). 
-	Accomplishing target inventory closings while ensuring the right service level throughout the month, and delivering 30% inventory reduction vs the previous year.
-	Capacity balancing across 4 technologies for 18 months horizon using SAP and OMP+.
-	Replenishing Safety stocks on plant, distribution centers level as well as some distributors. 
-	Fulfilling initiative master plan for rolling 3 months for the same markets on the 4 brands Ariel, Tide, Bonux, Lang and Yes).
-	Managing raw material team and ensuring no shortages are faced on raw material levels while meeting inventory targets.
-	Leading the short term planners learning program and ensure the full team working according to the company standard work process through the global run to target (RTT) exercises.
profile_positions.title: Site integrated Planner for Fabric care

profile_positions.description:
-	Managing production plans to ensure market needs are met for Egypt and Morocco from Fairy through Cairo Plant.
-	Replenishing Safety stocks on plant level and distribution centers.
-	Accomplishing target inventory closings while ensuring the right service level throughout the month and delivering 10% inventory reduction vs the previous year.
-	Capacity balancing across technologies for 18 months horizon using SAP and OMP+.
-	Planning two capacity-increase projects within 4 months and recovering back after both projects with the right service level.  
-	Successful SAP implementation within 6 months from joining the assignment. 
-	Fulfilling initiative master plan for rolling 3 months for Egypt and Morocco.
profile_positions.title: Site integrated planner for Home care

company.name: Abu-Ghazaleh& Co.Consulting/Member of Talal Abu-Ghazaleh Organization

profile_positions.company: Abu-Ghazaleh& Co.Consulting/Member of Talal Abu-Ghazaleh Organization
profile_positions.description: Responsible for Patent prosecution with the Egyptian Patent office, as well as Amending Pharmaceutical ones in such a manner as to make them in line with The Egyptian Patent Law and providing the Applicant with the broadest Protection Possible. Consultancy with Potential clients for what can be protected according to he Egyptian Patent laws.
profile_positions.title: Patent Assistant
